DOC.HEADLINE: CLINTON FALLS IN MUD DURING JOG
DOC.TEXT: President Clinton slipped and fell_in mud during his regular morning jog Thursday . The President , who was almost two miles into a three-mile run , slipped and fell on a muddy incline near the Tidal Basin in northwest Washington and soiled his long-sleeved white T-shirt , turquoise shorts and left leg . " He slipped and fell and got right back_up , " said a woman who ran with Clinton . " He got right back_up and ran even faster. " The President and members of a national running club ran three miles in just under 30 minutes on slippery conditions caused by a recent rainfall . A free-lance photographer in the White_House press corps who was taking pictures of the runners slipped and fell near the same area .
